name: Lily And The Labyrinth
description:
Books can be dangerous. Help lily escape the terrible consequences of her search for knowledge...

This is my first complete(ish) game! Made in 3 days for Jame Gam#16. 

Use WASD or arrow keys for movement. That is all.

I uploaded this right at the buzzer for deadline so I would expect there's a few bugs. Please let me know in the comments if you find one!

I also don't know if the balance is right as I'm the only one who has played it so far. You have 10 minutes to solve the labyrinth, I don't know if that's a decent amount of time or not.

I didn't get time for music or sound effects. Or many of the other features I had planned. I hope to keep working on this after the jam deadline and get it to a more complete state.
